path: artifacts/Step Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.Step: contracts/Step Full Smart Contract Security Audit/Step

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: The owner has excessive privileges that can be used maliciously, including disabling dump protection, disabling sniperTax, enabling trading, manually triggering swap back, withdrawing contract BNBs and BEP20 tokens, whitelisting addresses, adding CEX and market makers accounts, changing taxes and shares, changing swap back settings, changing transfer gas, and changing marketing and reward wallets.
